source.azureTableSourceQuery: PartitionKey eq 'Upload Data' and RowKey eq 'Communication'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT Last_Event_Date = MAX(Event_Date)
FROM EMERP_LM.azure.AZ_Communication
WHERE Event_Date < CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * 
FROM EMERP_LM.azure.AZ_Communication
where Event_Date > '@{activity('LK_Last_Date_Mng_azure_ETL').output.value[0].Last_Incremental_Date}' and Event_Date <= '@{activity('LK_new_max_date').output.firstRow.Last_Event_Date}'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT  LastIncrementalDate=LastId 
  ---- remove to use incremental
 FROM  Mng_data_factory_ETL
  WHERE TableName='Contacts'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT * from   EmErp_LM.azure.scmm_contacts
 where update_date > CAST(CAST('@{activity('LK_Last_Id_Mng_azure_ETL').output.firstRow.LastIncrementalDate}' AS bigint) AS VARBINARY(8))

azureTableSourceQuery.value: PartitionKey eq 'Upload Data' and RowKey eq '@{variables('Table_Name')}'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * 
FROM azure.AZ_Customer_Questionnaires
where Last_Update > '@{activity('LK_Last_Date_Mng_azure_ETL').output.firstRow.Last_Incremental_Date}' 
  and Last_Update <= '@{activity('LK_new_max_date').output.firstRow.Last_Update}'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT  LastIncrementalDate=DATEADD(DAY,-1,LastIncrementalDate)   
  ---- remove to use incremental
 FROM  Mng_data_factory_ETL
  WHERE TableName='Customers'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * 
FROM dwh.azure.AZ_calls
where callday> '@{activity('LK_Last_Date_Mng_azure_ETL').output.firstRow.Last_Incremental_Date}' and callday<= '@{activity('LK_new_max_Date').output.firstRow.Next_Call_Day}'

source.azureTableSourceQuery: PartitionKey eq 'Upload Data' and RowKey eq 'DWH_Calls'

azureTableSourceQuery.value: PartitionKey eq 'Upload Data' and RowKey eq '@{variables('Table_Name')}'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT Last_Date=MAX(Assignment_Date)
FROM azure.AZ_Lead_Assignments 
WHERE Assignment_Day BETWEEN
CAST(GETDATE() - 100 AS DATE) AND CAST(GETDATE() - 1 AS DATE)

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT * 
FROM azure.AZ_Lead_Assignments
where Assignment_Date > '@{activity('LK_Last_Date_Mng_azure_ETL').output.value[0].Last_Incremental_Date}' 
  and Assignment_Date <= '@{activity('LK_new_max_date').output.firstRow.Last_Date}'
  and Assignment_Day > dateadd(day,-1,cast('@{activity('LK_Last_Date_Mng_azure_ETL').output.value[0].Last_Incremental_Date}' as date))
  and Assignment_Day < dateadd(day,1,cast('@{activity('LK_new_max_date').output.firstRow.Last_Date}' as date))

properties.description:
Copy data from on premise SQL Server to SQL Azure.

You can also go to "Copy Data Tool" to get the pipeline for more connectors and scenarios.

activities.name: SQL_to_SQLAzure
activities.description: Copy data from SQL server to SQL Azure

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT  LastIncrementalDate=DATEADD(MINUTE,65,LastIncrementalDate)   
  ---- remove to use incremental
 FROM dbo.Mng_data_factory_ETL
  WHERE TableName='EMERP_DB_Events'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from  EmErp_DB.azure.AZ_EMERP_DB_Events
 where Event_Date > '@{activity('LK_Last_Id_Mng_azure_ETL').output.firstRow.LastIncrementalDate}' 
 AND Event_Date <= '@{activity('LK_new_max_id').output.firstRow.ExecutionDate}'

azureTableSourceQuery.value: PartitionKey eq 'Upload Data' and RowKey eq '@{variables('Table_Name')}'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT Last_Activity_Date = MAX(ActionDate)
FROM azure.AZ_Accounting
WHERE ActionDay BETWEEN CAST(GETDATE() - 100 AS DATE) AND CAST(GETDATE() - 1 AS DATE)

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * 
FROM azure.AZ_Accounting
where ActionDate > '@{activity('LK_Last_Date_Mng_azure_ETL').output.value[0].Last_Incremental_Date}' 
  and ActionDate <= '@{activity('LK_new_max_date').output.firstRow.Last_Activity_Date}'
  and ActionDay > dateadd(day,-1,cast('@{activity('LK_Last_Date_Mng_azure_ETL').output.value[0].Last_Incremental_Date}' as date))
  and ActionDay < dateadd(day,1,cast('@{activity('LK_new_max_date').output.firstRow.Last_Activity_Date}' as date))

azureTableSourceQuery.value: PartitionKey eq 'Upload Data' and RowKey eq '@{variables('Table_Name')}'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT Last_Date=MAX(ExecutionDate)
FROM azure.AZ_Deals
WHERE executionDay BETWEEN
CAST(GETDATE() - 100 AS DATE) AND CAST(GETDATE() - 1 AS DATE)

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * 
FROM azure.AZ_Deals
where executionDate > '@{activity('LK_Last_Date_Mng_azure_ETL').output.firstRow.Last_Incremental_Date}' 
and executionDate <= '@{activity('LK_new_max_Date').output.firstRow.Last_Date}'
and executionDay > dateadd(day,-1,cast('@{activity('LK_Last_Date_Mng_azure_ETL').output.firstRow.Last_Incremental_Date}' as date))
and executionDay < dateadd(day,1,cast('@{activity('LK_new_max_Date').output.firstRow.Last_Date}' as date))

source.azureTableSourceQuery: PartitionKey eq 'Upload Data' and RowKey eq 'SCMM_Activities'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * 
FROM EMERP_LM.azure.AZ_SCMM_Activities
where Activity_Date > '@{activity('LK_Last_Date_Mng_azure_ETL').output.value[0].Last_Incremental_Date}' and Activity_Date <= '@{activity('LK_new_max_date').output.firstRow.Last_Activity_Date}'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT  LastIncrementalDate=DATEADD(MINUTE,65,LastIncrementalDate)   
  ---- remove to use incremental
 FROM  Mng_data_factory_ETL
  WHERE TableName='Serials'
